title: Backup & Data Recovery in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Recover lost files, or make sure you never lose them again.
description: We offer expert backup and data recovery services in {{city_upper}}. Recover deleted files, restore failing drives, and set up automatic, encrypted backups for long-term protection.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Over 90 percent of people have no recent backup of their personal or business data.
Drives can fail without warning due to age, firmware bugs, electrical issues, or heat damage. SSDs often give no warning at all.
Ransomware can encrypt your files instantly and demand payment, but with a secure backup in place, recovery is fast and safe.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Recover deleted, corrupted, or inaccessible files from hard drives, SSDs, and USB drives
Assess hardware for signs of failure before total data loss
Configure encrypted, automated backup systems for personal or business use
Migrate data between devices, operating systems, or secure cloud platforms
Design custom backup plans with both local and offsite protection
Secure sensitive data using open-source tools and privacy-respecting platforms

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We begin with a risk-free evaluation to determine if recovery is possible without invasive methods. If the drive is readable, we recover what we can using trusted tools and validate the integrity of your data. Then we help you build a real backup strategy so you never face the same risk again.
